With bold designs that can be worn across generations and sexes, Tilly Sveaas is the all-inclusive jewellery brand that has inspired a wave of fashion lovers. And pieces start from just £35. Worn by celebrities including newly wed Sophie Habboo, their gold chains, classic hoops, and bestselling T-Bar necklace add a touch of luxury to any look. And now the brand has launched a new coronation collection featuring handmade dog tags and ingots, presented on a variety of bestselling chains.  Small Gold Coronation Ingot on Fine Curb Chain  Why not celebrate King Charles III’s coronation with this limited edition hallmarked Gold Coronation Ingot?Sitting on a delicate gold chain, the gold Coronation ingot is carved out of sterling silver and gold plated in two microns of fair-mined 18kt gold. This piece is a classic staple and a sentimental collector’s piece that is only available until February 2024.  £160 Shop

Quality, timeless, glamourous jewellery can often come with a hefty price tag, but at Tilly Sveaas, each hand-crafted piece comes with a very enticing price tag. Designed to be stacked and layered, these pieces are classic and appealing to all ages and genders, so they can always be a part of your wardrobe. To mark the standout occasion of the year, the coronation of His Majesty King Charles III and Her Majesty The Queen Consort, the brand has launched a limited-edition coronation collection with pieces you'll want to treasure forever.

In celebration of the momentous day, Tilly Sveaas has designed a series of limited-edition handmade dog tags and ingots, presented on a variety of the brand's best-selling chains.Available in solid sterling silver or gold plate, each pendant displays the five hand-punched hallmarks that together narrate the authenticity of each piece.The stamp’s meanings go as follows; TS – Tilly Sveaas Sponsor Mark, 925 – Fineness Mark for Stirling Silver, Anchor – for Birmingham Assay, OfficeLion – Traditional mark for Stirling Silver, Coronation Mark – King Charles 111 Coronation Commemorative Mark.This stamp is only allowed to be used until February 2024, meaning that these pieces truly are limited editions and sentimental collector's items.

Specializing in hand-crafted pieces that are classic in design, the expensive-looking jewellery has surprised many with its affordable price point, with bestselling pieces starting from just £35. Undeniably gorgeous, all the pieces created by Tilly Sveaas ooze luxury and style. Shoppers can browse through chunky linked bracelets, classic hoops, to statement rings.Timelessness, quality and design purity are at the forefront of each piece in her evolving collection, so whoever you are shopping for you're bound to find something. And the best news? Shoppers can get 10 per cent off with their first order.
